lead_paragraph: Wolfie’s Tavern, a bar that caters to the year-rounders on the East End of Long Island, is shutting its doors, and some patrons feel their way of life is also slipping away.

headline.print_headline: Last Call in East Hampton for a Working-Class Bar
headline.main: East Hampton Bar Is Set to Close, Taking More Than Its Stools

snippet: Wolfie’s Tavern, a bar that caters to the year-rounders on the East End of Long Island, is shutting its doors, and some patrons feel their way of life is also slipping away....
abstract: Wolfie's Tavern in East Hampton, dive bar catering to year-round residents, is set to close after disagreement over lease terms; closing is emblematic of demographic shift in Hamptons, as businesses catering to moneyed summer crowd edge out ones that serve working- and middle-class locals.
